transArray.content: There is free parking in the store, and breakfast is buffet style. The service was excellent.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to have a clean and comfortable stay. The hotel is located in the Badili Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road, 5 km from Haidian Metro Line 6. It only takes a five-minute walk from Luju Station. Public transportation is accessible in all directions, making travel convenient. There are ample parking spaces shared with the park and parking is convenient. Thank you for your support and recognition, which enables all the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel to move forward. We are full of confidence and look forward to meeting you every time! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
